bibl.title: The Meaning of "sun hemioliai" and Kindred Expressions in Loan Contracts.
bibl.note: "Sun hemioliai" when it occurs as a modifier of the amount of the loan in the acknowledgment-of-receipt clause means "including 50 % interest".
